alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:51PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Washington and southeastern Baker Counties through 315 PM MDT/215 PM PDT/... At 250 PM MDT/150 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lime, or 21 miles northwest of Weiser, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Big Lookout Mountain and Sweedes Landing around 210 PM PDT. McChord Butte and southern Brownlee Reservoir around 310 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
